About Me

Hi, I'm Hasan! Currently based in Potsdam, Germany, I'm a Data Scientist with a focus on AI systems and RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation). While my expertise lies in data science and machine learning, I maintain a curious mind that extends beyond technical domains.

Professional Background

About This Space

This is my personal knowledge repository where I document my learning journey across various domains. While my professional expertise is in data science and AI, I'm curious about many other fields. Here, you'll find:

  • Technical insights from my work in AI and data science
  • Notes from books and papers I'm reading
  • Explorations in science, technology, and other interesting topics
  • Learning resources and practical guides

Current Focus

Currently working on:

  • Developing RAG systems with Azure OpenAI
  • Exploring efficient prompt engineering techniques
  • Studying vector storage and embedding methods
  • Learning German (currently at A1 level)
